Control

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.CourseController

  • public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This course controllers manages the creation,modification and deletion of courses
    Since:
    2017-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ameen, Ashiq, Will, Reuben, Waqas

        Returns:

      • checkCourseCode

        public boolean checkCourseCode(java.lang.String courseCode,
                               java.lang.String matricNum,
                               java.lang.String newMatricId)
        This method is invoked when two students who wish to swap index with each other This method checks whether the two students are enrolled in the same course in order for the swap to take place
        Parameters:
        courseCode - of a particular course
        matricNum - of the student A
        newMatricId - of the student B
        Returns:
        True if the course code is correct and false if otherwise
